Hotel NYX Bilbao


Opened in 2019, thi is a new concept hotel in Bilbao. Art has always been the soul and source of inspirarion in this hotel. At NYX Bilbao they embrace the charm of nature, hence incorporating it as their main theme for both exterior and interior design of the hotel

Centrally located, the NHX Bilbao featuress 108 rooms, modernly equipped. The Clash restaurant and Bar offers an international breakfast buffet and a wide range of liquors selection for the evening. Besides, the rooftop Terrace will be the perfect place to relax and chill after the day.

The hotel has a conferece room for business meetings that are all kitted out with the lastest equipment.

Location: 2km from City centre

Category: 4 stars

Restaurants: 1 restaurant and rooftop terrace

Wifi: Available in rooms and common areas

Nr. Rooms: 108 rooms

Handicapped facilities: no

Swimmingpool: no

Check in/out: 3pm /noon

Meeting rooms: 1 up to 55p
